docs.text: Inserting sequence diagrams in MkDocs with pymdownx.superfences Steps Insert js file Sample sequence diagram Title: Hello world example Bob->Alice: Hello Alice-->Bob: How are you? Note left of Bob: Bob thinks Bob->>Alice: I'm good, thanks! How about you? Alice-->Bob: I'm doing great, thank you! Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
